column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Varrick says : " Aim for that spot in the middle of the back - the one I can never reach . "
#Text=Zhu Li says : " Got it . "
#Text=Varrick says : " Wah , let 's get out of here !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I need more power !
#Text=They 're cutting in !
#Text=More power !
#Text=" Asami says : " We need to get out of here .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " Almost there .
#Text=" Asami says : " We have to go now !
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " Almost there .
#Text=Almost there !
#Text=" Asami says : " Dad !
#Text=Now !
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " Goodbye , Asami .
#Text=I love you .
#Text=" Asami says : " Dad !
#Text=" Korra says : " Hiroshi 's plan worked .
#Text=There 's our opening .
#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Hiroshi Sato Korra Lin Beifong Mako Suyin Beifong Tenzin Varrick Wu Zhu Li Antagonists Kuvira Military of the Earth Empire says : " Minor Baatar Jr. .
#Text=Bumi Daw Evacuee Ikki Jinora Kai Meelo Opal Beifong Pema Ryu Tu Wei and Wing " Shiro Shinobi says : " Welcome to Republic City , the place of hopes , dreams and Spirit Wilds !
#Text=This metropolis truly has something for everyone .
#Text=Visit Air Temple Island , the hub for all airbenders as they travel the world , helping others .
#Text=Or take a stroll through beautiful Avatar Korra Park , named in honor of " You - Know - Who " !
#Text=We 've missed her these past three years and we ca n't wait to welcome her home .
#Text=Get well soon , Korra !
#Text=And of course , you 'll want to see our most unique attractions : the Spirit Wilds .
#Text=Here , spirits and people live harmoniously together .
#Text=Like this old codger , and his new pals .
#Text=Yes siree , this town is truly on the up and up !
#Text=Come be a part of the action in Republic City !
#Text=" Raiko says : " And of course , my biggest thanks goes to Asami Sato and Future Industries .
#Text=She brought our old central terminal into the modern era .
#Text=Ladies and gentlemen , the world is entering a new age of peace and prosperity .
#Text=Soon , Prince Wu will take his rightful place on the Earth Kingdom throne .
#Text=And thanks to our updated rail system , Republic City and the Earth Kingdom will be united like never before !
#Text=" Wu says : " Hey there !
#Text=Asami , right ?
#Text=Great train house .
#Text=Maybe you can give me a personal tour sometime , what do you say ?
#Text=" Asami says : " I do like the idea of putting you on a train and sending you far , far away .
#Text=" Wu says : " That 's ... that 's funny .
#Text=I like funny dames .
#Text=Maybe I should introduce myself .
#Text=I 'm Prince Wu , future king .
#Text=" Asami says : " Yeah ... I 'm aware of who you are .
#Text=" Wu says : " Do n't let my reputation intimidate you .
#Text=I 'm still human just like everyone else .
#Text=Only more human , like , extra human , or , hmm , superhuman .
#Text=" Asami says : " Superhuman ?
#Text=" Wu says : " So , what do you say ?
#Text=Can I show you a low - key night out with a superhuman soon - to - be king ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Prince Wu !
#Text=President Raiko has some really important ... king stuff to talk to you about .
#Text=" Wu says : " Now ?
#Text=Fine .
#Text=Think over the offer .
#Text=I 'll be back .
#Text=" Mako says : " He 's a real charmer , huh ?
#Text=" Asami says : " He 's ... something .
#Text=How can you stand being his bodyguard ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , I just remind myself that once he 's on the throne , I go back to being a detective .
#Text=" Asami says : " And that works ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I also go home , and smash my head into the wall for an hour , you know , just to get the stress out .
#Text=" Asami says : " It 's good to see you , Mako .
#Text=It 's been too long .
#Text=You hear from Bolin lately ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I have n't talked to him for a while , but he 's coming in a few days for the coronation .
#Text=And Beifong told me that Korra is getting in tonight .
#Text=" Asami says : " I ca n't wait to see her .
#Text=It 's going to be weird , having the old Team Avatar back in the city after all these years .
#Text="
